subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The clock showed 7:14 when Dwyane Wade hit a 3 that pushed Miami’s lead to 15 points. After LeBron James and Wade danced, the Mavericks went on a 22-5 run.
snippet: The clock showed 7:14 when Dwyane Wade hit a 3 that pushed Miami’s lead to 15 points. After LeBron James and Wade danced, the Mavericks went on a 22-5 run.
